el:protected.el:luamain:
rooms_wide=1 rooms_high=1
levelw=1+(19*rooms_wide)+1 levelh=1+(12*rooms_high)
create_world( levelw, levelh) enigma.SlopeForce=10
fill_floor("fl-bluegray", 0,0,levelw,levelh)
speed=3
function renderLine( line, pattern) for i=1, strlen(pattern) do local c = strsub( pattern, i, i) if c =="#" then set_stone( "st-death", i-1, line) elseif c == "o" then oxyd( i-1, line) elseif c=="z" then set_actor("ac-blackball", i-.5,line+.5, {player=0}) elseif c=="A" then set_actor("ac-horse", i-.5,line+.5,{force=speed, target1="1 1", target2="18 1", target3="18 11", target4="1 11"}) elseif c=="B" then set_actor("ac-horse", i-.5,line+.5,{force=speed, target1="16 3", target2="3 3", target3="3 9", target4="16 9"}) elseif c=="C" then set_actor("ac-horse", i-.5,line+.5,{force=speed, target1="14 7", target2="5 7", target3="5 5", target4="14 5"}) elseif c == "D" then --1-d set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=1}) elseif c == "U" then --2-u set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=2}) elseif c == "R" then --3-r set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=3}) elseif c == "L" then --4-l set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=4}) end end end
renderLine(00,"#o################o#") renderLine(01,"#A #") renderLine(02,"# #######UU####### #") renderLine(03,"# o Bo #") renderLine(04,"# # #o########o# # #") renderLine(05,"# # # # # #") renderLine(06,"o # L ###oo### R # o") renderLine(07,"# # # C# # #") renderLine(08,"# # #o########o# # #") renderLine(09,"# o o #") renderLine(10,"# #######DD####### #") renderLine(11,"#z #") renderLine(12,"#o################o#")
oxyd_shuffle()
